attributes.action: Provide a way for private candidates to get qualifications this summer
attributes.additional_details: Many people were unable to receive grades last year meaning many people had to put their future plans it is now looking like this may happen again. This shouldn’t be happening
attributes.background: I like many private candidates were let down by the government last year and were unable to receive grades for our exams. With the recent cancellation of exams i would like there to be a fair and accessible way for all private candidates to receive fair grades

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566425
